eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adults with pheochromocytoma / paraganglioma undergoing surgical resection

Exclusion Criteria:

* Children \< 18 years

outcomeMeasures.title: Hemodynamic Instability
outcomeMeasures.description:
Proportion of operative time outside target thresholds: SBP \>180 or \<80; DBP \> 90; MAP\>150 or \<50; HR\>90.

Arterial line blood pressure measurements were extracted from the electronic medical record every 60 seconds.

outcomeMeasures.title: Quality of Life- Physical Functioning, Role Limitations Due to Physical Problems, Bodily Pain, General Health Perceptions, Vitality, Social Functioning, Role-limitations Due to Emotional Problems, and Mental Health
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients will take the SF-36 as well as a symptom survey describing the frequency and impact on their quality of life at several time points including prior to starting alpha blockade, immediately prior to surgery after being sufficiently blocked, and postoperatively at 30 days, 3 months, 6 months, and 1 year

outcomeMeasures.title: Morbidity as Assessed by Occurrence of Adverse Events
outcomeMeasures.description: Morbidity will be graded by Clavien Classification of adverse events

outcomeMeasures.title: Participants Admitted to Post-operative Intensive Care Unit (ICU)
